findings.title: TFS-3:Staking is only compatible with tokens of decimal 1e18
findings.description: The staking functionality is only compatible with tokens having a decimal value of 1e18.

findings.title: TFS-14:Unified optimization of the coinage process in TokaVe
findings.description: The claim() function mint token logic should be consistent with the vesting() function, needs to determine the number of amount to prevent invalid operations.
